adminUserName.description: Name of the Elastic DocumentDB cluster administrator

adminUserPassword.description: Password for the Elastic DocumentDB cluster administrator. Can contain any printable ASCII characters. Must be at least 8 characters

arn.description: ARN of the DocumentDB Elastic Cluster

authType.description: Authentication type for the Elastic DocumentDB cluster. Valid values are `PLAIN_TEXT` and `SECRET_ARN`

endpoint.description: The DNS address of the DocDB instance

kmsKeyId.description: ARN of a KMS key that is used to encrypt the Elastic DocumentDB cluster. If not specified, the default encryption key that KMS creates for your account is used.

name.description: Name of the Elastic DocumentDB cluster

shardCapacity.description: Number of vCPUs assigned to each elastic cluster shard. Maximum is 64. Allowed values are 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64

shardCount.description:
Number of shards assigned to the elastic cluster. Maximum is 32

The following arguments are optional:

subnetIds.description: IDs of subnets in which the Elastic DocumentDB Cluster operates.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the collection. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

vpcSecurityGroupIds.description: List of VPC security groups to associate with the Elastic DocumentDB Cluster
